Class Huffman

java.lang.Object
Huffman
public class Huffman
extends java.lang.Object
The Huffman class for Huffman encoding and decoding.

    The constructor for the Huffman class.

    Implements Huffman Coding to compress the file.

  • Method Details

    • encodeHuffman

      public void encodeHuffman​(Node root, java.lang.String binaryString)
      Implements Huffman Coding to compress the file.
      Parameters:
      root - is the root node of the tree.
      binaryString - is the string of binary digits for that character's coding.

    • decodeHuffman

      public void decodeHuffman​(java.util.ArrayList<Node> nodes, java.lang.String codedString, java.util.Scanner in)
      Implements Huffman Decoding to decompress the file.
      Parameters:
      nodes - is the tree structure for the type of encoding.
      codedString - is the string of bits for the file.
      in - is the scanner used to take user input.

    • nextBranch

      public void nextBranch​(Node root, java.lang.String codedString, Node topNode, java.lang.String fileName)
      Helps to implement the Huffman Decoding to decompress the file.
      Parameters:
      root - is the root node of the tree.
      codedString - is the string of binary digits for that character's coding.
      topNode - is the constant root node of the tree.
      fileName - is the name of the destination file.
